field.value:
This patch allows generics to be used remotely.
see http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=1873
I am not convinced that it is the nicest patch so it would be nice if someone who knows more about the inner workings of the remoting facility could have a look at it.
Patch also includes fix for the Castle.Facilities.Remoting.Tests-vs2005 project: - added DOTNET2 compilation symbol - added reference to System.Configuration - readded reference to windsor 2005 project.
Thanks Ayende for the MSDN article. Specialisation using generics and windsor is very neat.
